name: MoveToEntity
description: Move to a specific entity like a person, object, or item in the simulation world.
usage: Use this action when you need to approach a specific entity to interact with it.

parameters.name: entity_name
parameters.description: The name of the target entity to move to

examples: Moving to a specific person to talk to them
Approaching an object to use it
Moving to an item to pick it up
requirements: Target entity must be accessible from current location
Must be included in the available movable positions
whenToUse: Need to interact with a specific person
Want to use or examine a particular object
Need to pick up a specific item
Want to get closer to something for better interaction
